Acts ch. 46, sec. 12, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1997 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 34, effective May 30, 1997; and ch. 4, sec. 12, effective May 30, 1997. -- Created 1994 Ky.
